scanuploadqrcode.camera.headline: Scan QR Code with Camera
scanuploadqrcode.camera.instruction: Start camera and hold qr code in front of it
scanuploadqrcode.camera.detecterror: No camera detected or access denied
scanuploadqrcode.image.headline: Load QR Code from image file
scanuploadqrcode.image.instruction: Select an image from which to load the QR Code
secret.key.headline: Click on the key and order the election secret
secret.notification.success.text.key-gen: Your election secret has been successfully created. Now you just need to store it securely.
secret.notification.info.text.important: Store your election secret locally and securely. Saving it is very important, because once a secret has been saved and lost, it cannot be recovered by us and would mean that you lose your vote
secret.generateqrcode.headline: Save as image
secret.generateqrcode.subheadline: You can save the QR code with the personal voting key as an image
secret.navigationbox.gotoregister.before: I already have my election key and would like to order my polling card.
secret.navigationbox.gotoregister.afterg: I would like to order my polling card.
I have my polling card and would like to vote directly.
register.notification.error.noelection.t: Incorrect call. Please go back and follow the previous link again!
register.text.ballotdescription: The electoral administration uses the ballot paper to check your eligibility to vote. To do this, your voting secret is encrypted locally and then uploaded to the electoral administration.
I do not have an election key or would like to order a new one
If you do not yet have an election key or have lost it, you can order a new one in just a few steps.
register.uploadqrcode.headline: Check election secret
register.uploadqrcode.subheadline: Please select your saved election secret to prove that you have it!
register.uploadqrcode.uploadSubHeadline: You can simply upload your election secret here as an image and have it checked.
register.uploadqrcode.scanSubHeadline: You can easily have your election secret checked via your device camera.
register.generateqrcode.headline: Save image
register.generateqrcode.subheadline: You can save the QR code with the ballot paper as an image.
register.notification.attention.headline: Attention:
register.notification.attention.text: If you vote directly now, a link may be established between your vote and your identity. Vote at a later time and from a different internet connection to guarantee a secret ballot and to better protect your privacy.
register.confirmpopup.modaltext: Have you really saved or photographed your Anonymous ballot paper? You can only participate in the election with your Anonymous ballot paper.
register.confirmpopup.confirmmessage: Yes, I have saved my Anonymous ballot paper.
pollingstation.notification.error.ballot: The data of the saved ballot paper does not match this election.
pollingstation.notification.success.ball: The register has recognised your ballot paper. You are now ready to vote!
pollingstation.notification.error.ballot: The data on this ballot paper could not be processed.
pollingstation.headline.ballotneeded: You need a ballot paper to vote
pollingstation.navigationbox.registerfor: I don't have a ballot paper yet and would like to order one
pollingstation.navigationbox.continuetov: I have my polling card and would like to vote directly
pollingstation.uploadqrcode.headline: Check ballot paper
pollingstation.uploadqrcode.subheadline: You can simply upload your ballot paper here as an image and have it checked.
pollingstation.uploadqrcode.uploadSubHea: You can easily upload your ballot paper here as an image and have it checked.
pollingstation.uploadqrcode.scanSubHeadl: You can easily have your ballot paper checked via your device camera.
pollingstation.button.errormessage: An error occured during vote processing. Please try again in a few seconds. If the problem persists please contact election officials.
votetransactionstate.error.transaction: The transaction was malformed. Please contact election officials.
votetransactionstate.info.success: Your vote was successfully processed and immutably written to the blockchain.
